AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the account to which the data belongs.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign to which the keyword belongs.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group to which the keyword belongs.

KeywordId.description: The unique identifier for the keyword being reported.

Keyword.description: The keyword that triggered the ad and is being reported.

AdId.description: The unique identifier for the ad responsible for the keyword's performance.

TimePeriod.description: The time period for which the performance data is reported.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for monetary values in the data.

DeliveredMatchType.description: The match type that delivered the keyword's ad.

AdDistribution.description: The type of ad distribution for the performance data.

DeviceType.description: The type of device on which the ad was displayed.

Language.description: The language targeting for the keyword's ad.

Network.description: The network where the ad was displayed (e.g., search, display).

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device on which the ad was displayed.

TopVsOther.description: The comparison between the top ad positions and other ad positions.

BidMatchType.description: The match type used for the keyword's bid.

AccountName.description: The name of the account to which the data belongs.

CampaignName.description: The name of the campaign to which the keyword belongs.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group to which the keyword belongs.

KeywordStatus.description: The status of the keyword (e.g., active, paused).

Impressions.description: The total number of times the keyword's ad was shown.

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the keyword's ad.

Ctr.description: The click-through rate for the keyword.

CurrentMaxCpc.description: The current maximum cost per click bid for the keyword.

Spend.description: The total cost spent on displaying the ad for the keyword.

CostPerConversion.description: The average cost per conversion for the keyword.

QualityScore.description: The relevance and quality of the keyword's ad.

ExpectedCtr.description: The expected click-through rate for the keyword based on historical data.

AdRelevance.description: The relevance score of the ad associated with the keyword.

LandingPageExperience.description: The evaluation of the landing page experience for the keyword.

QualityImpact.description: The impact of quality score changes on ad performance.

Assists.description: The number of assists (interactions before a conversion) that the keyword contributed to.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend specific to the keyword.

CostPerAssist.description: The average cost per assist for the keyword.

CustomParameters.description: Any custom parameters associated with the keyword.

FinalAppUrl.description: The final URL for the app download destination.

Mainline1Bid.description: The bid needed to appear in the first mainline position.

MainlineBid.description: The bid needed to appear in the mainline positions.

FirstPageBid.description: The bid needed to appear on the first page of search results.

FinalUrlSuffix.description: The suffix added to the final URL for tracking purposes.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions for the keyword.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified view-through conversions for the keyword.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The average cost per conversion for all types of conversions.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend considering all conversions.

Conversions.description: The total number of conversions generated by the keyword.

ConversionRate.description: The conversion rate specific to the keyword.

ConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions from the keyword.

AverageCpc.description: The average cost per click for the keyword.

AveragePosition.description: The average position where the ad was shown for the keyword.

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions for the keyword.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all types of conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The overall conversion rate considering all conversions.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all types of conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue per conversion for all types of conversions.

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the keyword.

RevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue per conversion for the keyword.

RevenuePerAssist.description: The average revenue per assist for the keyword.
